full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### *Streamer, Signal Distress*

**Government Contract Announcement**

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01010371
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-237215/A
**Publication Date:** 18 October 2022
**Closing Date and Time:** 18 November 2022, 14:00:00
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Amendment Date:** 27 October 2022

**Event Details:**

The Department of National Defence has issued a Request for Proposal for the acquisition of specific safety and rescue equipment.

**Scope of Work:**

The required items are:

* **Streamer Signal Distress** - Part No.: SAR 6125 RR, NCAGE: 1CFD4, (GSIN: 4240)
* Quantity: 250 units, Unit of Issue: Each

**Delivery Information:**

The required items are to be delivered to the following locations by December 30th, 2022:

* CFSD Montreal
* CFSD Edmonton

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is covered under various free trade agreements, including:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Identification Number (GIN):**

* NIBS (French): 4240
* UNSPC (English): None
* UNSPC (French): None

**Tender Description:**

The Department of National Defence invites requests for proposal from suppliers for the procurement of safety and rescue equipment.

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Bidders are strongly encouraged to submit their proposals electronically using the epost Connect service.

**Contact Information:**

* **Danny Lebel**, Procurement Specialist
* **dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca**
* Department of National Defence
* 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0K2

**Notice of Tender:**

A notice regarding the proposed procurement may be accessed at [CanadaBuys](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-22-01010371) or [request the documents](#), <a href="https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/27/05
